column4: Hey. In Ubuntu 8.04, can I get Ubuntu to show the icon for a USB drive from autorun.inf?
Hey. In Ubuntu 8.04, can I get Ubuntu to show the icon for a USB drive from autorun.inf?
does it show up in the windows computer where you made it?
honestly, i googled something like "create icon thumb drive " (w/o quotes) when i created mine, and i figured out how to get it to w work for mac, windows and linux
Bridget: i think I found the problem. it takes the icon from an EXE. Could that be the issue?
from an exe? ... you mean the image path  is something like "./image_thumb.exe"?
yeah.. when i did it I actually had a designated image for the icon
Bridget: And I don't think Ubuntu does
i think it does (otherwise most favicons on the web wouldn't show up in linux browsers). wait so its an ico or an exe? i believe i used ico...
